subtitles.text: Yes! I'll keep you hooked on Ikiri World whether you're asleep or awake! This is Yukiyuki Wrinkle, a.k.a. Ikiri!
Let's go!
I've been meaning to tell you this somewhere.

AKB's new song "Jutte kimi ga suki dakidatta" was performed for the first time.
We had a lot of lessons at night for about a week before the first performance.
We all choreographed together.
This song is not a dance song at first glance.
but it was a bit difficult and intense, and we had a lot of things to do together.
After quite a few lessons...
There's an interlude after the second chorus, right?
There's a pretty intense dance part there.

Then two more came out, then five, and so on...

It was really difficult.

I really worked hard.

Let's do it like it's the last performance.
